ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] [OT] Fascinating Article
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To continue acting sexist and being realistic; if you don t think women want to /be/ Firiona you re not paying attention to all those insanely
ygData.messageBody:
--- JESSICA_WEBBER@... wrote:
> So how did I (and other women) get interested in EQ if the marketting is
> all geared toward men? Desire to *be* Firiona? No way. Everyone's
> different, but I can't imagine most women would be drawn to her. Think
> about the covers of the four boxes. On three of them, Firiona's not even

To continue acting sexist and being realistic; if you don't think women want
to /be/ Firiona you're not paying attention to all those insanely
insecurity-exploiting women's magazines out there, and all the fools who buy
them and then sit around at home hating themselves for being (allegedly) so
fat and ugly in comparison, and end up ridiculously immitating the advice and
models in the articles.
